mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, title, CONVERT(content USING euckr) as content, writer_id, password, hits, reg_type, header_type, inpdt, moddt FROM fa_notice WHERE 1=1 AND header_type = #{notice.headerType} ORDER BY inpdt DESC

SELECT seq, name, password, email, phone_number AS phoneNumber, title, content, content_open AS contentOpen, comment, reg_dt AS regDt, file_size AS fileSize, file_name_origin AS fileNameOrigin, file_name_upload AS fileNameUpload, file_type AS fileType, ctype AS cType, header_type AS headerType FROM COMMON_BOARD WHERE seq = #{notice.seq} AND ctype = #{notice.cType}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMON_BOARD SET name = #{notice.name}, password = #{notice.password}, email = #{notice.email}, phone_number = #{notice.phoneNumber}, title = #{notice.title}, content = #{notice.content}, file_size = #{notice.fileSize}, file_name_origin = #{notice.fileNameOrigin}, file_name_upload = #{notice.fileNameUpload}, file_type = #{notice.fileType}, content_open = #{notice.contentOpen}, header_type = #{notice.headerType} WHERE seq = #{notice.seq} AND ctype = #{notice.cType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMON_BOARD (name, password, email, phone_number, title, content, reg_dt, file_size, file_name_origin, file_name_upload, file_type, ctype, content_open, header_type) VALUES( #{notice.name}, #{notice.password}, #{notice.email}, #{notice.phoneNumber}, #{notice.title}, #{notice.content}, #{notice.regDt}, #{notice.fileSize}, #{notice.fileNameOrigin}, #{notice.fileNameUpload}, #{notice.fileType}, #{notice.cType}, #{notice.contentOpen}, #{notice.headerType})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMON_BOARD WHERE seq = #{notice.seq} AND ctype = #{notice.cType}
